languages.text: На каждом имперском корабле есть святилища. Здесь служители Экклезиархии следят за чистотой веры членов экипажа и укрепляют их дух в путешествии по темным уголкам галактики, где таятся немыслимые ужасы.

На каждом имперском корабле есть святилища. Здесь служители Экклезиархии следят за чистотой веры членов экипажа и укрепляют их дух в путешествии по темным уголкам галактики, где таятся немыслимые ужасы.

languages.text: Every ship of the Imperium has shrines. This is where the servants of the Ecclesiarchy watch over the purity of the crew's faith and fortify its members' spirits on journey after journey through the dark corners of the galaxy where unthinkable horrors lurk.
languages.original_text: На каждом имперском корабле есть святилища. Здесь служители Экклезиархии следят за чистотой веры членов экипажа и укрепляют их дух в путешествии по темным уголкам галактики, где таятся немыслимые ужасы.

Every ship of the Imperium has shrines. This is where the servants of the Ecclesiarchy watch over the purity of the crew's faith and fortify its members' spirits on journey after journey through the dark corners of the galaxy where unthinkable horrors lurk.

languages.text: Todas las naves del Imperium contienen templos. Aquí es donde los sirvientes de la Eclesiarquía vigilan la pureza de la fe de la tripulación y refuerzan el espíritu de sus miembros durante sus viajes interminables por los rincones oscuros de la galaxia, donde moran horrores inimaginables.
languages.original_text: Every ship of the Imperium has shrines. This is where the servants of the Ecclesiarchy watch over the purity of the crew's faith and fortify its members' spirits on journey after journey through the dark corners of the galaxy where unthinkable horrors lurk.

languages.text: 帝国の船にはすべからく神殿がある。そこでは帝国聖教会に仕える者たちがクルーの信仰の純度を監視し、想像を絶する恐怖が潜む銀河の暗黒を隅々まで旅するクルーの精神を支えている。
languages.original_text: Every ship of the Imperium has shrines. This is where the servants of the Ecclesiarchy watch over the purity of the crew's faith and fortify its members' spirits on journey after journey through the dark corners of the galaxy where unthinkable horrors lurk.

languages.text: 帝国的每艘飞船都设有圣殿，国教忠诚的仆人负责维护船员信仰的纯洁性，在一次次穿越银河系阴暗角落的旅程中为船员提供精神支柱，保护他们免受难以想象的恐怖之物所害。
languages.original_text: Every ship of the Imperium has shrines. This is where the servants of the Ecclesiarchy watch over the purity of the crew's faith and fortify its members' spirits on journey after journey through the dark corners of the galaxy where unthinkable horrors lurk.

languages.text: Auf jedem Schiff des Imperiums gibt es Schreine. Hier wachen die Diener der Ekklesiarchie über die Reinheit des Glaubens innerhalb der Crew und stärken den Glauben ihrer Mitglieder auf ihren Reisen in die dunklen Winkel der Galaxie, in denen unvorstellbare Schrecken lauern.
languages.original_text: Every ship of the Imperium has shrines. This is where the servants of the Ecclesiarchy watch over the purity of the crew's faith and fortify its members' spirits on journey after journey through the dark corners of the galaxy where unthinkable horrors lurk.

languages.text: On trouve des sanctuaires à bord de tous les vaisseaux de l'Imperium. C'est là que les serviteurs de l'Ecclésiarchie surveillent la pureté de la foi des membres de l'équipage et fortifient leur esprit pour les aider à endurer les nombreux voyages dans les sombres recoins de la galaxie où rôdent des horreurs innommables.
languages.original_text: Every ship of the Imperium has shrines. This is where the servants of the Ecclesiarchy watch over the purity of the crew's faith and fortify its members' spirits on journey after journey through the dark corners of the galaxy where unthinkable horrors lurk.

languages.text: İmparatorluk'un tüm gemilerinde mabetler bulunur. Ekleşiarşi'nin hizmetkârları, buradan mürettebatın inancının saflığını koruyup korumadığını denetler ve galaksinin akla hayale gelmez dehşetlerinin kol gezdiği karanlık köşelerinde yolculuk üstüne yolculuk yapan bu mensupların morallerini yüksek tutmaya gayret ederler.
languages.original_text: Every ship of the Imperium has shrines. This is where the servants of the Ecclesiarchy watch over the purity of the crew's faith and fortify its members' spirits on journey after journey through the dark corners of the galaxy where unthinkable horrors lurk.
